reviews.review_msg: Avoid her at all costs, your GPA will go down and therefore it is NOT worth taking her classes, even if the syllabus seems easy. She is very two faced and acts nice in class but then turns into a savage when marking/emailing.
VERY condescending and rude. She makes you feel like an idiot. She seems nice at first but that doesn't last long. Avoid her at all costs.

The course was generally easy with help from a good TA, but Reilly really makes my blood boil.She is very belittling and makes you feel stupid when answering any questions you might have.She comes off as a sweet, gentle lady for one second, then the next she is a completely condescending, impatient shrew.
